definitions: To clean or empty (a toilet or drain) by causing water to flow through it.
To become red in the face, typically as a result of embarrassment, heat, or strong emotion.
To cause (a bird or animal) to fly up or run out from cover.
To rinse or cleanse thoroughly with a flow of water.
To glow with a warm, reddish color.
examples: He flushes the toilet after each use.
Her face flushes when she's nervous.
The dog flushes out the pheasants.
She flushes the wound with saline solution.
The evening sky flushes with the setting sun.
